body: A law that, "would have required government institutions, and private entities tied to the state, to make information available to the public without, necessarily, a formal request, by establishing an accessible database of information," is stalled, as reported by Voices from El Salvador's Weblog.
original_body: A law that, "would have required government institutions, and private entities tied to the state, to make information available to the public without, necessarily, a formal request, by establishing an accessible database of information," is stalled, as reported by Voices from El Salvador's Weblog.
title: El Salvador: Transparency Law Stalled
